item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @jake111 jake111
item.description:
@jake111 wrote:

thanks for the help, i’ll write if something goes wrong

EDIT:i still can’t log in… everytime I try it says “error connecting to server.must be down”
and what is that “no-ip” and “ham”- thing and “pass”?
plz reply[br][size=1]Posted on: May 29, 2007, 10:55:44 AM[/size][hr]sorry for double post, but i really need help! plz reply

Read full topic

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @t3h_0wn4g3 t3h 0wn4g3
item.description:
@t3h_0wn4g3 wrote:

go onto:
moparisthebest.com

find a server ip of the advertisement section eg:
thebestscape.no-ip.org(not a real server)

copy that into the section saying " server ip: "
add any username and password, not your runescape username and password though! never do that.
and click log in.
simple =]
t3h.

Read full topic
